```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


A. F-Distributions with Same NCP but Different dfs

```{r}

df1X <- 10
df2X <- 20

df1Y <- 20
df2Y <- 40

n <- 10000

ncp <- 0

X <- data.frame(rf(n, df1X, df2X, ncp))
colnames(X) <- "x.val"

Y <- data.frame(rf(n, df1Y, df2Y, ncp))
colnames(Y) <- "y.val"

ggplot(data = X, mapping = aes(x.val)) + 
  geom_density(color = "red") + 
  geom_density(data = Y, mapping = aes(y.val), color = "blue") + 
  geom_vline()


```
